name: U-Bot
description:
This is my first participation in a Ludum Dare (LD 48 compo). I came with no gamdev experience (only some general programming skills), but learned a lot during the process. Sadly, I didn't have the time left to add sound and any other of the dozens of things on my ToDo list, but I'm still very happy I made it to the end with an actual working game.

Tools used

Unity + Piskelapp.com
